availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Add MS 22911 ff 373-380v: An account of the Jews, Karaites and Rabbanites are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
